thread.title: Vox Populi: 'We need righteous, Christian people to oust the corrupt from God's church.'

author: DispatchDaemon
title: Vox Populi: 'We need righteous, Christian people to oust the corrupt from God's church.'
text:
SPECIAL OFFER FOR NEW READERS 99 cent digital subscription to savannahnow.com
Subscriber-members get access to ALL our digital products AND become eligible for free event tickets, discount coupons and other benefits. SIGN UP FOR SUBSCRIBER BENEFITS As a Savannah Morning News / savannahnow.com subscriber, you're eligible for members-only discounts. Download your coupons now. “This was not Pope Francis’ first trip to America. He was born in America...South America!”
“The corruption in the government does not begin to compare to the corruption in the church. We need righteous, Christian people to oust the corrupt from God’s church. If you straighten out the church, the rest will follow.”
“We need a pet obituary or memorial section. We lost our beloved 11-year-old Golden Retriever, Bear, last week and we would love to memorialize him. Who else feels the same?”
“Mark Streeter’s cartoon about Ben Carson was so unfair. He needs to grow up.”
Vox Populi
Contribute to Vox Populi by calling 912-525-0VOX (0869) or emailing us at vox@savannahnow.com . Be sure to write Vox Populi in the subject field. Not all responses are used.
